review: 1 week early from this non Amazon fulfilled item. It was a gift and I was thrilled. Who needs prime with sellers like this. GREAT JOB. I did expect them to be better packaged as refurbished, like a lot. But I was just going to rip it open and it all works perfect do, who cares really, I prefer to save the money!!!
author: Joseph Foster

review: This is my second Chromecast. Works great!!!
author: JAVIER FERNANDO CALDERON

review: I bought the Google Chromecast Player 6 months ago.  Got it to use with Netflix in a bedroom.  It works well when using Netflix, but when streaming a show directly from the internet i is often choppy.  I would recommend it for use with Netflix or browing the web, but not for streaming media from the web.
author: Tami
